citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 15:05 on
07-FEB-19.
No one home. Waited at the facility for 30 minutes. Attempted to make contact by telephone twice but no one
answered and the voice mailbox was full.
